item.title: How to use camera and capture photos in your app without using any other apps in Android Studio (using camera2)
item.description: In this tutorial we will go step-by-step on how to implement camera2 in our android app through opening a dialog with camera view, capturing a picture and display it in an ImageView without the need to open the default camera app or any other app in Android studio.
